name: Baldur's Gate Name Generator
description: Roll for initiative! Need a name worthy of Faerûn? This generator conjures up epic monikers for your characters, whether they're destined for glory or doomed to a goblin's stew. Get ready to embark on your adventure with a name that resonates with the Forgotten Realms!
introduction: Welcome, adventurer, to the Baldur's Gate Name Generator! Tired of generic names that wouldn't scare a squirrel? Fear not! Our arcane algorithms weave together the essence of Faerûn to forge names that sound like they were ripped from the pages of a legendary tome. Whether you're a noble paladin, a mischievous rogue, or a spell-slinging wizard, we've got the perfect name to kickstart your epic tale.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A name, blessed (or cursed) by the gods, will appear before your very eyes.
Don't like the first result? Keep clicking! We've got more names than there are dungeons in the Underdark.
Feeling fancy? Tweak the prefixes and suffixes to craft a name that's uniquely YOURS. Just don't blame us if you accidentally summon a demon.
Copy and paste your chosen name into your character sheet and prepare to become a legend. Or at least someone worth gossiping about at the Elfsong Tavern.

faqs.question: Will this generator make me a better D&D player?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But you'll have a cooler name while you're failing your saving throws. Think of it as +1 to Charisma (roleplaying bonus only).

faqs.question: Are these names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: We've poured over the lore of Baldur's Gate and the Forgotten Realms to make these names feel authentic. That being said, some names are purely for fun. Use your best judgement!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my novel/game/pet hamster?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Consider it a gift from the gods of creativity. Just promise to give us a shout-out if your hamster becomes famous.

faqs.question: What if I still can't find a name I like?
faqs.answer: Keep trying! The perfect name is out there, waiting to be discovered. Or, you know, just make one up. That's what the gods would want you to do.

faqs.question: Is this generator powered by magic?
faqs.answer: Let's just say we consulted with a few friendly wizards. And by 'consulted,' we mean 'bribed with pizza'. So, yes, technically, there's magic involved (pizza magic).

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes and suffixes?
faqs.answer: Of course! Send us your suggestions, and who knows, your contribution might end up inspiring the next generation of adventurers. We're always looking for fresh ideas to keep the generator spicin'!
